item.title: YouTube Channel Manager - SEO and Paid Growth Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
The Change Doctor, led by Dr. Michelle Rozen, is a pioneering force in personal development and transformation. We empower leaders and individuals to embrace change, overcome challenges, and achieve their highest potential.

Our YouTube channel is vital to our mission, providing valuable content that inspires and educates our growing audience. We seek a dedicated and innovative YouTube Channel Manager to grow our channel through expert SEO and paid strategies.

Role Overview:
As the YouTube Channel Manager, you will be responsible for optimizing our channel for search and implementing paid strategies to increase visibility, engagement, and subscribers. Your expertise in YouTube SEO, data analytics, and digital marketing will be essential in achieving our growth objectives.

Key Responsibilities:
SEO Optimization:
Conduct keyword research to identify high-impact terms.
Optimize video titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails.
Develop and implement strategies to improve video rankings and channel discoverability.

Content Strategy:
Collaborate with Dr. Michelle Roen and the content team to plan and execute a content calendar.
Analyze performance data to refine content strategies and improve engagement.

Paid Campaigns:
Plan, execute, and manage YouTube ad campaigns (Google Ads).
Optimize ad spending to maximize ROI and achieve growth targets.
Analytics and Reporting:
Monitor and analyze channel metrics and campaign performance.
Provide regular reports with insights and recommendations for improvement.

Community Engagement:
Engage with the audience through comments and community posts.
Foster a positive and interactive community environment.
Qualifications:

Proven experience managing and growing YouTube channels.
Strong knowledge of YouTube SEO and paid advertising strategies.
Proficient in using YouTube Analytics and other SEO tools.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Creative mindset with a passion for personal development and transformation.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Preferred Skills: (not a must)

Experience with graphic design tools (e.g., Photoshop, Canva) for creating engaging thumbnails. -A PLUS
Familiarity with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).
Understanding of social media marketing and its integration with YouTube strategies.



Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:25 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Campaign Management, Video Advertising, Education, Google Analytics, YouTube, SEO Keyword Research, Marketing Strategy, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Campaign Management, Video Advertising, Education, Google Analytics, YouTube, SEO Keyword Research, Marketing Strategy, YouTube Marketing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
